name: Life of Pi
description: This is a Survival Simulator, you having to chop down tress, collect stones to make your tools and weapon, there are many customizable thermal weapon you can choose to fight demons or other players, you can also driving through the desert, grasslands and snow mountain, you have to help Pi survive.

name: Tulgey Wood
description: Tulgey Wood is a magical adventure game inspired by the classic tale of Alice in Wonderland.

name: The Revolt Fire Rising
description: The revolt fire rising, traitors are everywhere. Is the council working for you or the enemy? Is the army on your side or are they against you? Answers will bring more questions

name: The Swordsmen X: Green-bamboo pack
description: This DLC item is a construction blueprint (not a finished product). Green Bamboo Weapons need to be forged at level 8 to unlock and make them. Green Bamboo Houses need to be built at level 16 to unlock and make them. It takes a long time in the game, so please buy carefully!

name: X-Dead Detective
description: A single player, first person shooter, adventure game featuring voice acting and story. Explore space stations and future city environments, collect items to further your investigation. A somewhat gritty, storydriven, cyberpunk-ish, drone shooting, FPS game.

name: Wukong Odyssey
description: Wukong Odyssey is an epic adventure game with a classic platformer-style gameplay that will keep you entertained for hours. As the fearless hero, Sun Wukong, you'll embark on an incredible journey through a magical world filled with danger and excitement.

name: NeonHClouds
description: In this shooting game, the gorgeous effects and easy-to-use gameplay allow for a thrilling and exciting experience in every battle.

name: SM
description: A Super Metroid decompilation for PC.

name: Desterium
description:
Since the beginning of the game, each character has a race that determines their physical form and a class that determines what they excel at in the game. Throughout the game, each player's character learns skills that will determine how successful (or not) they will be at their trade. The first two attributes (race and class) are chosen by the player when creating his character. The skill attribute mainly depends on the experience during the game and is deeply influenced by the way of playing and the preferences of each player.

The action takes place in a fictional virtual world where you take the role of a character who interacts with other characters, whether they are controlled by other players or by non-player characters. All the interactions take place in a fantastic environment like in a traditional role-playing game. You can chat with other characters on the screen, and through interactions, trade, trade, make friends, or other activities. We are waiting for you at Desterium!

name: Fiona's Farm
description: Welcome to Fiona’s Farm! The most exciting farm adventure full of mysteries and love triangles. Solve colorful blast puzzles to earn energy and coins. Then, use them to help Fiona renovate the damaged buildings and hearten the farm. A breathtaking journey awaits!

name: The Other Shore
description:
The Other Shore an RPG title that tells the wonderful story of heaven and earth. At the beginning of the creation of the world, God created a paradise to share divinity with man. However, man was deceived into sin, causing God to abandon man and paradise forever.

Since then, the world has been divided into two parts including the present world, which is full of war, conspiracy and abyss, which is full of spirit and sin. To return to the ideal paradise, people have been searching endlessly "Tears of God" because they possess mysterious powers. However, as the soul gradually awakens, the immediate question is whether humans should be wiped out of all sense of self and become lifeless beings?

name: Survive The Unknown
description: A classic Indie horror alien survival game.

name: Saint Kotar: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
This Digital Deluxe Edition includes:
• Saint Kotar: Base game
• Saint Kotar: The Ritual DLC
• The Art of Saint Kotar: Digital Artbook
• The Sound of Saint Kotar: Saint Kotar original soundtrack (OST)

name: Soul Cliff
description: A souls-like game about saving a trapped beloved beneath a collapsed sink-hole. The gameplay mechanics is a souls-like experience with the added ability of an ultimate ranged attack minus a riposte mechanic. It is a short-story with a potentially confusing moment.

name: Traversal
description:
"I can't stay stranded on this island."

Having crash-landed on an island in the Atlantic Ocean, you take the role of Player, a man determined to get back to the mainland for his nephew's sake. While traversing through several islands in this action adventure game, you'll need to help the islanders, solve puzzles and survive to make your way back home.

name: The Chicken Family
description: Embark on an adventure with a daring and determined hen, as she sets out to rescue her chicks from treacherous cages. Use your wit and puzzle-solving skills to navigate through challenging levels filled with obstacles, traps, bridges, and more. Collect cookies, gems, and coins along the way, unlocking new levels, worlds, and customization options. Help the hen lead her chicks safely to the coop, but be careful not to fall off the platforms or get stopped by rolling barrels and sharp traps. With vibrant, cartoon-style graphics and exciting, fast-paced gameplay, this low poly 3D platformer puzzle game is a delightful experience that will keep you entertained for hours. So gather your courage, grab your key, and join the hen on her quest to save her chicks and become the ultimate chick hero.

name: Kartoon Crazy Racing
description:
The most entertaining racing game you will ever play! It will do the delights of the lovers of the speed and 3d cars with these incredible super karts of competition. A battle in the candy looking tracks with an agreeable aesthetic for kids and players of all ages.
Enjoy the most impressive cars in this 3d car racing game! You have to take the turbo to advance positions, you can also throw paint, slingshot with bee, take double turbo that will get you to advance many positions in the crazy 3d race these funny little friends have mounted.
If you love cars and motorcycles racing games you can not pass up the opportunity to drive a super kart, with your favorite cartoon! You can choose over 16 amazing and unique different skins on 8 of the candy tracks you will see.
Crash kart and move your opponents, throw Bee, send a hurricane! Try to not catch the balloons when you are at the top positions or you will be affected by AutoBoom! Leaves trails of oil to your opponents and they will can’t follow you! Enjoy this 3d game and shows who the best in the world.

name: Yak Dash: Horns of Glory
description:
Race yaks across perilous mountains at break-neck speeds!
Yak Dash: Horns of Glory is an exciting 2D side-scrolling racer that tests reaction time, skill, and bravado. Experience 17 levels in four treacherous mountain ranges. Complete each level as fast as possible by smashing obstacles, leaping chasms and discovering shortcuts along the way.

name: WaveRun
description:
WaveRun is a simple, yet addictive, one tap, endless race game with amazing music and a mind-blowing gameplay.
Tap to change your lane, avoid obstacles, collect stars and survive to get the highest score.
Different game modes with two difficulty levels, including totally random, procedurally generated maps will enrich your gaming experience.
So challenge yourself, earn achievements and get to the top of the leaderboards!

name: Pilot Winds
description: Touch to fall. Fall for speed. Fly for score!

name: Tiny Car
description:
Tiny car is an action packed racer. Stay on track or explode into pieces!
Addictive.

name: Dead Earth: Combat Shooter 3D
description: Become the last hope of humanity in a dramatic war against rebellious machines. Shoot tons of bullets, explore unbelievable cities and defeat a deadly boss in the ultimate battle.

name: BaseballOut!
description:
BaseballOut! is inspired by old school games from the nes, the playstyle is like Classic arcade games meet baseball where you have to face different leagues and be the champion , each of the rivals has a different style and throws different shots, try to get the gold medal with each of them!
You can unlock collectible cards with extra info about the characters of the game , new outfits with special characteristics and use them to beeat your rivals.

name: Fun Goal 3D
description:
Football Game is all about getting to the soccer goal and scoring goals! You’ve never played a football game like this before.
Run with the football, follow curved and winding paths on the soccer field, dribble pass countless enemy football players and crazy obstacles to get to the soccer goal, and score the perfect goal!
Tap and hold to play this fast-paced soccer game. Just make sure you don’t hit the other football players or any other crazy obstacle in your way! Can you get to the end? You’ll need lightning-fast reactions, perfect timing and all your football hero superpowers to get to the goal!
Experience soccer in a way you have never experienced before. You'll find it so simple you'll never want to play another football game. You’ll score one goal after another like a professional football player. You're the striker, and nobody will get in your way as you kick balls and score goals!
You’ll face hundreds of challenges across the levels with all kinds of different football players and obstacles. You will discover these as you master shooting goals and you become a soccer star. You will earn coins as you progress the levels and you’ll be able to buy all kinds of balls.
This football game will take you back on the soccer field to the game of your dreams.

name: Bike Dash
description:
Feel the rush as you ride your bike across hazardous trails avoiding obstacles while performing gravity defying tricks to reach the farthest you can.
The game combines authentic mountain bike downhill action with an extreme endless runner.
Earn extra coins by performing tricks and combos in huge jumps .
Level up to unlock more insane tricks and upgrade your gear.

name: The King of Thieves
description: King of Thieves is frighteningly addictive game in which you must demonstrate a cunning, perceptive and intelligence. Grab the treasure and don't get caught the soldiers who defend it. 20 different levels, and each of them will provide you many moments of great fun. Play and become the King Of Thieves.

name: Block!
description: “Block!” is an exciting block fitting game. Easy to play, and pleasurable game for all ages. Simply Drag the blocks, and fill up all grids. From now on, let's enjoy a simple and addictive puzzle game!

name: Ball Avalanche
description:
Help Torgui dodge the avalanche of balls heading towards him.
The challenge of the game is to last as long as possible dodging the balls without being hit by any or the game ends. So prepare your reflexes and your skills to be the best in the world dodging the avalanche of balls and get the best time of your game! Challenge your friends and compare the leaderboard to get the best score in the world.

name: Bubble Shooter Heroes
description:
Join the Bubble Shooter adventure and rescue all the animals to become an epic hero!
Discover the challenging levels across the many colorful worlds and help make the world a better place by freeing the animals.

name: Yark!: A Kobold Adventure
description: Steal the priceless treasures of the local kingdom to pay back your debts to a dragon in this stealth and thievery based, old school fantasy game.

name: Heart Fragment: Book Three - Despair Fragments
description:
Includes Natalia and Jasper's routes.

Your progress towards the truth leaves you desperate for answers in this tangled web of fear in Book Three: Despair Fragments. "Fantasy" has been torn apart, "belief" becomes increasingly twisted, and "despair" threatens to engulf it all. Book Three reveals intentions and motives that you may have begun to piece together through the previous routes, but what will you discover by examining that evidence from the viewpoint of the villain?

name: Trailblazer Advance
description: Trailblazer Advance is an unofficial modern conversion of Shaun Southern's old 8-Bit classic.

name: Auto Necrochess
description: After struggling to live with no job, a girl becomes a necromancer and tries to overthrow the King.

name: Yakyuuken
description: Another Rock, Paper, Scissors game. It is different to Morra, as it is in first person.

name: Vs. Football
description: A top-down soccer game that plays somewhat like Pong.

name: Take a Smile
description: Take quality pictures of the happy women in cars passing by, while avoiding taking pictures of the angry women.

name: Swing Fall
description: Land on top of the buildings from above. Features the same character as Explore and Mr. Runner.

name: Super Rabbit
description: Aim in the right direction with the right force so the rabbit can land on the bottle(s).

name: Sprint
description: Jump between the sides of the buildings in order to avoid obstacles. The protagonist appears to be Zool on Luigi's body.

name: Smart Frog
description: Guide the frog across the lilypads in a specific way to eliminate them all. Graphics are used from an unidentified Frogger game.

name: Secret Bottle
description: Same concept as Fish Quiz.

name: Pool Quiz
description: Turn all of the tiles pink within the limited moves.

name: Pile the Box
description: Stack the treasure chests on top of each other without knocking over the forming tower.

name: North Salvation
description: A clone of Mr. Driller.

name: Mr. Runner
description: A game similar to Explore, starring the same character, but continues endlessly rather than in small sections.

name: Mr. Mosquito
description: Shoot the mosquito who is not wearing a gas mask.

name: Morra
description: A "Vs. Fighter"-styled Rock, Paper, Scissors game starring Pucca.

name: Money Go!
description: Collect the money while avoiding negative sales figures, which will cause the character to horrifically bleed out of his face.

name: Mister Easter
description: Catch a certain amount of eggs.

name: Mini Golf
description: A mini golf game with a pseudo-3D perspective.

name: Manic Troll
description: A Gold Miner clone.

name: Little Plane
description: Clone of Paper Plane from WarioWare, Inc.

name: Let's Go
description: A clone of Door Door. The character is replaced with Toad (seemingly using graphics from a Mario & Luigi game) wearing a Santa hat, and the enemies are replaced with Goombas and the Dr. Mario Viruses.

name: Kongfu
description: A first-person boxing game. The game appears to feature only two rounds.

name: Kitchen War
description: Throw the objects at the chef.

name: Juggle
description: Clone of the Game & Watch game Ball.

name: Imp and Cubes
description: Puzzle game with the player controlling two Caspers. Three of the same shape must be lined up to eliminate them.

name: Hot Racing
description: A top-down racing game with shooting mechanics, similar to Spy Hunter.

name: Happy Mice
description: Clone of the Game & Watch game Mario's Cement Factory. Some of the graphics are taken from the Game & Watch Gallery 4 port of the game.

name: Hamster Fighter
description: A Whac-A-Mole game, different than Whack the Critter. Inexplicably features birds and not hamsters.

name: D&D Classics
description: This ultimate collection consists of 30 iconic Dungeons & Dragons video games. These include “Gold Box Classics”, "Silver Box Classics", "Spelljammer: Pirates of Realmspace" and other adaptations of the D&D universes that bring to life many iconic locations, monsters, heroes, and villains.

name: Fishing
description: A Fishing game unrelated to the later port of the Vii Catch Fish.

name: Magic Bubble
description: A Bust-a-Move clone.

name: Fun Claw
description: A simulation of a claw machine.

name: Fruit Killer
description: A game based on Fruit Ninja, featuring a visible, movable ninja who moves left and right.

name: Fossick Underground
description: Guide the machine to collect all of the coins while escaping to the other side.

name: Firefight Bro.
description: Clone of the Game & Watch game Fire. The player controls Mario and Luigi with their mustaches removed, catching helmet-wearing Marios from Wrecking Crew '98. Hacks include Air Circus (VT3xx) and Spring Bros (VT3xx). Air Circus uses a custom graphic of Circus Charlie based on the arcade machine's artwork.

name: Go Soccer
description: Sin descripción

name: Find the Way
description: Guide the chicken down the right path to collect the egg.

name: Final Ninja
description: You control a ninja who must hit samurai using a crosshair.

name: Farm Pinball
description: A pinball game. Later hacked to create Go Soccer (VT3xx).

name: Explore
description: A game comprised of small platforming-puzzle challenges. Seemingly higher-budget than the other titles.

name: Dodgeman
description: Clone of the minigame Cavity Calamity from Warioware, Inc., turned into a full game. When the player dies, a voice sample of Fred Flintstone saying "Yabba Dabba Doo!" is played.

name: Dart
description: A basic darts game for consoles with VT3xx chip.

name: Code Eagle!
description: Clone of the arcade game Intrepid. The player must go into all of the castle's rooms and steal the items hidden within them. In the top room, the player must give the ID ticket to the guard in order to steal the safe. Then the castle must be exited as quickly as possible. The main character appears to be a modified version of Bomberman.

name: Close Shell
description: Clone of Lights Out!.

name: Bubble Hero
description: Collect the stars while avoiding the cannonballs.

name: Brains Diamonds
description: Navigate the cube to collect all of the coins and land in the star tile.

name: Climbing Challenge
description: Clone of Donkey Kong Jr. starring what appears to be Funky Kong. Levels 3 and 4 from the original are swapped around.

name: Bird Hunter
description: Sin descripción

name: Baby Arms
description: Clone of the Game & Watch game Donkey Kong 3.

name: Monster Truck Ramp Stunt
description:
Its an action-adventure game for risk-takers. This monster truck simulator game provides you the right dose of crazy fun and impossible challenges. It’s time to show your car driving skills on the impossible tracks on the sky. Bring out your inner stuntman, dash through the extreme deadly tracks. It’s the ultimate car driving simulator stunt game you have been waiting for.
Embark on an epic journey of impossible stunts. Turn on the engine and be prepared for the most thrilling ride. We know your love for monster truck performing crazy stunts. So try it yourself!
Take control of the wheels in the extreme stunt game, Use acceleration, Brakes and steering wisely to avoid falling down. Drive insanely, speed up and make your truck jump through mega ramps to complete challenges. Isn't it the best truck games you always dreamt of.
Once you become a champion player in Monster Trucks Stunt Racing 3D, then even sky is not the limit for you!

name: Farmer Drift!
description: Parked! Collect money! Get out of the parking lot! How far can you go?

name: Derby Quest: Horse Manager HD
description: The Ultimate Horse Breeding, Training, and Racing Game! Grow your stable with many horses and train them to become Derby Champions. Breed your champion race horses to create 'super baby' horses that become even faster! Derby Quest is an amazing horse care-taking and racing simulation game. It's a game full of strategy and arcade action.

name: City Rush
description:
Lead the cars and beat the time records! Thousands of people love City Rush!
Control the city’s traffic on junctions. Isn’t it the most challenging game ever?
Please note: City Rush is completely free to play but some in-game items such as maps will require payment. You can turn-off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

name: Air Cavalry: Flight Simulator
description:
More than 5,000,000 people around the world downloaded Air Cavalry flight sim!
Get into the cockpit of the most advanced helicopters in the world, including the UH-60 Black Hawk, MV-22B Osprey, CH-47 Chinook, AH-64 Apache, UH-1 Iroquois, OH-6 Cayuse, AH-1Z Cobra, CH-53 Super Stallion, Eurocopter Tiger, Kiowa Warrior, Mi-24 Hind, Ka-50 Black Shark or Mi-8 Hip helicopter in various regional environments, building on your flying skills and experience. Enjoy infinite flight in legendary helicopters like a real combat pilot.

name: Idle Space Force
description:
A retro idle adventure that plays like a top down shooter!
Join the Idle Space Force and take a journey through space to unique 8 bit worlds as you collect enough loot to make your way back home, upgrade your ship, and discover hidden treasure along the way!

name: Brave Kaka
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Move Fun
description: Sin descripción

name: MaJong16
description: Sin descripción

name: MaJong13
description: Sin descripción

name: Unrecord
description: Unrecord is a tactical shooter where players can expect an immersive and narrative experience. Unrecord features complex dialogues, innovative gameplay mechanics, tough moral dilemmas, and a unique shooting system. The storyline in Unrecord can be compared to a detective novel or a thriller. The player will have to investigate several criminal cases and confront a diverse cast of characters. The game's plot and presentation will be central to the gameplay experience, and players can anticipate a range of gameplay sequences as well as numerous plot twists.

name: Star Ally
description: Star Ally is a space shooter game developed by JungleTac, and is included on numerous plug and plays. This game is very similar to the Famicom title Recca. It is based on VT09 hardware.

name: Time Pilot
description: Licensed port from Konami.

name: Scramble
description: Licensed port from Konami. Later hacked to create Night Wings (VT3xx).

name: Space Invaders Part II
description: Licensed port of the arcade game.

name: Move Fun
description: A basic puzzle game. Later hacked to create Fruit Fall (VT3xx).

name: Fire Fighter
description: Clone of Flying Hero for the Famicom.

name: Elfland
description: Clone of the 1992 game of the same name. Despite using the same graphics as the original, it is not based on the same engine, and was ported from scratch. It is unknown if JungleTac's version was a licensed port or not.

name: Big Burger
description: Sin descripción

name: Squirrel Bobble
description: Sin descripción

name: Bust-A-Move
description: Licensed port of the arcade game. Later hacked to create Squirrel Bobble.

name: BurgerTime
description: Licensed port of the arcade game. Later hacked to create Big Burger.

name: Snood Towers
description: A licensed port of Snood for NES-based platforms.

name: Snood
description: Licensed port of Snood for NES-based plug & plays.

name: Motor Rally
description: Sin descripción

name: Block Out
description: Sin descripción

name: Pair Memo
description: Sin descripción

name: Pool Pro
description: Sin descripción

name: One Day of Mr. Potato
description: A platforming game where the player must collect keys to free the imprisoned "potato". The player cannot jump, only climb ladders. The main characters strongly resemble Kirby, but they are actually modified versions of Tiki from The NewZealand Story. Later hacked to create Defender (VT09).

name: Video Poker
description: Sin descripción

name: Texas Hold'Em
description: Sin descripción

name: Slot Machine
description: Sin descripción

name: Free Craps
description: Sin descripción

name: Caribbean Stud
description: Sin descripción

name: Black Jack
description: Sin descripción

name: Zippy Froger
description: There are several frogs and caterpillars on the screen. The player must strategically bounce the frogs' tongues off of each other in order to reach and eat all caterpillars.

name: Yummy
description: A clone of Gussun Oyoyo with original graphics. The player character is the same girl from Magic Jelly.

name: Wobble
description: The player controls a monkey somewhat resembling Diddy Kong, and must attempt to balance a glass of juice without letting it spill.

name: Win or Lose
description: You control a paddle and must bounce the balls until the timer runs out.

name: Which Way
description: The player controls a dog with a baby on his back, and must avoid obstacles.

name: Tutelary
description: A rather advanced platformer where an angel must collect coins; the angel can fly, but can only flap her wings up to three times in one jump.

name: Treasure Hunt
description: The player must collect all of the gems. Oddly, the level layout and mechanics are similar to Lode Runner, but the gameplay is largely different (and much more basic).

name: Toy Kingdom
description: A game similar to Flicky, in which a girl must rescue the creatures and lead them to the escape doorway; enemies can be defeated by throwing furniture.

name: Super Move Quest
description: A basic puzzle game similar to Move Fun.

name: Sudoku
description: Sin descripción

name: Seek the Resources
description: A top-down game where the player must collect coins. The player character is the Pokemon Trainer from Pokemon FireRed.

name: Rolling Cube
description: A clone of the Flash game Bloxorz.

name: Rapid Stream
description: The player must guide a submarine through a path without crashing into walls (which will explode the submarine on contact), while shooting at enemies.

name: Quick Move
description: Sin descripción

name: Puzzle Pop
description: Move the tiles to pop the bubbles.

name: Pop Ball
description: Clone of Pang! starring Ness from Earthbound. Later hacked to create Bubble Master (VT3xx) and Magic Ball (VT3xx).

name: Pool Pro
description: Enhanced port of the NES-based game. While the original version is visually based on Side Pocket, the Sunplus and GBA ports are instead based on Minnesota Fats: Pool Legend for the Sega Genesis.

name: Plumber
description: A side-scrolling platformer; oddly, the game has no music. In the Game Boy Advance version, there are voice lines seemingly taken from a South Park game, which have nothing to do with the game's context whatsoever (the lines being "You are lame at that game!", "Nice moves!", and "You unlocked some goodies in the candy store this time!").

name: Pinball Fish
description: Despite the name, it is a Breakout clone.

name: On N Off
description: A clone of Lights Out!.

name: Mystic Totem
description: Get the rings around the totem to the other side. Later hacked to create Move It (VT3xx).

name: Mr. Onion
description: Enhanced port of the NES-based One Day of Mr. Potato; some sound effects are taken from Galaga. The title screen of the Sunplus version features modified artwork of Pac-Man from Pac-Mania.

name: Motor Rally 2
description: Enhanced port of the NES-based Motor Rally.

name: Mission
description: A side-scrolling platformer.

name: Match it Up
description: Effectively the same as the VT-based game Pair Memo, though new tiles spawn from the top of the screen instead of the bottom.

name: Coin Digger
description: Same as the VT3xx-based gameplay-wise, though the graphics are unique. The Game Boy Advance version features Dora the Explorer controlling the crane.

name: Magic Jelly
description: The player controls a girl on a broomstick, and must lay "magic bombs" to turn all stage tiles to a different color.

name: Magic Cubes
description: A Tetris clone; the music is taken from Balloon Fight.

name: The Lost World
description: A somewhat Frogger-like game with a military theme.

name: Lightning Plan
description: A side-scrolling shooting game.

name: Jump Frog
description: A peg game featuring frogs.

name: Jewel Master
description: Same as the VT3xx-based version of Jewel Master.

name: Jewel Fever
description: A Magical Drop clone; it does not seem to be based on either of the Disney Game It! clones in coding. The player character seems to loosely resemble Mario dressed as a pirate.

name: Ice Climber
description: Clone of the NES game of the same name.

name: Hot Drop
description: The player controls Mr. Frosty from the Kirby series, and must collect objects in the clouds; he then must enter the UFO at the bottom of the screen. Mr. Frosty can blow bubblegum bubbles to fly to the platforms.

name: Hero Legend
description: Clone of Don Doko Don! starring a modified and recolored version of the sprite used for Link in The Legend of Zelda: Four Swords and The Legend of Zelda: The Minish Cap.

name: Happy Farm
description: A clone of the Flash game Happy Pill. Hit the rabbits with the carrot until they are all blushing; you cannot hit them too many times or else you will lose.

name: Go, Smile
description: A clone of Go! Go! Mile Smile. Some levels feature Pookas from Dig Dug as enemies.

name: Go Bang
description: Same gameplay as Ball Battle or Winlinez, though it is a different game code-wise.

name: Garden Weeder
description: Carefully maneuver the mower to cut all of the grass without hitting the Bibarels (a character from Pokemon). Otis from the movie Barnyard appears in the bottom-left corner.

name: Fruit Fall
description: Also known as Fruit Rotation, though the Sunplus port uses the actual Fruit Fall name and features a password system.

name: Fire Fighter
description: Different than the VT09 version; it is still a clone of Flying Hero, but with different levels.

name: Finger Dancing
description: The player controls a girl in a penguin costume, and must leap across platforms by pressing the corresponding button shown on the platform (e.g. up, down, left or right on the controller).

name: Find the Way
description: Unrelated to the VT3xx game, instead playing like a more complex version of the VTxx-based game Flying.

name: Find Food
description: The player controls a caveman, and must navigate a series of doors to collect the food scattered around the stage.

name: Final Round Tennis
description: A tennis game with somewhat realistic graphics; different to the "Wii clone" Tennis game.

name: Final Escape
description: Clone of Pengo.

name: Dream Bubble
description: Same as the VT3xx-based game. A Tetris clone similar to Magic Diamond, though it is seemingly coded differently. The game features a "special mode" which merely turns the screen upside down.

name: Dragon
description: A platforming game somewhat similar to Rainbow Islands. To reach certain platforms and/or defeat enemies, the player must launch a "dragon" which can be walked across momentarily.

name: Defence Mission
description: A clone of Battle City with people instead of tanks.

name: Deep Storm
description: A shooting game with a pseudo-3D perspective.

name: Campaign
description: The player controls a bear, and must jump across very small platforms to collect bananas.

name: Caddie
description: A clone of Dharma Dojo for the Super Famicom, with unique visuals.

name: Busy Bong
description:
A Soukoban clone. Busy Bong features Egyptian-like visuals, while Busy Busy features standard warehouse graphics.
Included in the Zeus, a handheld/plug-n-play game console manufactured by Lexibook Limited.

name: Bump Jump
description: Enhanced port of the NES-based Block Out.

name: Flame Beetles
description: Make all of the beetles touch each other. The "sunflower counter" graphic (seen when losing a level) is taken from Hamtaro: Rainbow Rescue.

name: Brave Heart
description: Somewhat a clone of the original Mario Bros., though the player must climb ladders to reach higher platforms instead of jumping.

name: Box Puzzle
description: Loosely based on Soukoban, the player must move boxes to form paths across a series of islands.

name: Bomb Hero
description: Same as the VT3xx-based Bomb Hero. The version titled Bomb Hero is identical to the VT3xx game visually (including the Kirbys and Jigglypuffs), while additionally using music from Bomberman II; the version titled Hero features different graphics, and uses Boos from the Mario series as enemies.

name: Blue
description: The player controls a frog and must collect items across the bubbles.

name: Winlinez
description: Clone of Lines, or some variation thereof.

name: Ball Blaster
description: Same as the VT3xx-based Ball Blaster gameplay-wise, though the graphics are unique; featuring a girl using the launcher and a small creature in the bottom-right. It does not seem to be based on either of the Disney Game It! Zuma clones in coding.

name: Auto X
description: A racing game taking place on a pirate island.

name: Angry Birds Dice Adventure
description: Angry Birds Dice Adventure is an upcoming game in the Angry Birds series.

name: Footy Ball: Pass Pass Soccer
description:
The new lean, mean game of soccer. Fast, high-tempo games of football designed for pick-up and play.
Quick matches where the players auto-run and you use one finger to pass and score wonderful goals. Its easy to learn but hard to master in this semi-retro game.
Take your fictitious team from the lower leagues at the start of the 2017 - 2018 season to the top tier of your chosen country.

name: Hit Tennis 3
description: Swipe or flick your finger to hit the ball. It feels like real tennis!

name: Mahjong 2 Classroom
description:
A Premium Mahjong for Everyone
Whether you play Mahjong everyday or want to learn how to master this game, Mahjong 2 Classroom was made for you!
Based on an old Chinese solitaire game, Mahjong is a free solitaire matching game which uses a set of Mahjong tiles. The goal of this pyramid game is to match open pairs of identical tiles and remove them from the board, exposing the tiles under them for play. You will be challenged to eliminate all pieces from the board.
In this brand new 3D version, we bring you stunning HD graphics. Experts will have the opportunity to play with the classic Mahjong tiles. Beginners will be introduced to the game through simpler and very colorful tiles based on all the classics from Magma Mobile.
For those of you who like brain and puzzle game, chess, checkers or backgammons, you will for sure enjoy this Premium Mahjong !

name: Diamond Gems
description: Simple and smooth game play, great music and amazing graphics. Three addictive game types in one, which brings you the ultimate gems blasting experience... plus more.

name: Lost Lands
description:
Lost Lands has a treasure hunting theme with a simple goal in each level - picking up a gem to accumulate collection value. But you need to find your way through doors that open one way but block another. It starts with 4 doors, but as the number of doors increases, finding your way could be mind-boggling. You are challenged to accumulate more than one million dollars of collection value.

Seeking more challenge? The game provides a second play mode where you are awarded with stars for shorter routes.

name: Smiley's Way Out
description:
A Maze game? A Labyrinth game? A Pipe game?
Its a very new, Innovative maze puzzle game with 200+ levels.

name: Hardwood Rivals
description: It's time for basketball! The sequel to Basketball Time is back and better than ever. Hardwood Rivals introduces revamped shot mechanics and lets you customize your own player!

name: Pudding Bang 2
description: A new style of Whack-A-Mole Game with Cute Puddings. Puddings are trying to break out from mobile. Please stop them!

name: Mean Machines
description: Mean Machines is a one-of-a-kind action-racing game inspired by Demolition Derby, RC Racing and Robot Wars. With beautifully textured environments, realistic physics and damage models and a tremendous variety of content and game modes, Mean Machines is your definitive daily dose of action in the most accessible, pick-up-and-play package for mobile!

name: Maximum Car
description:
Drift and boost your way through 5 unique game worlds in one hundred tasty looking cars. Battle your way to victory, complete missions or enjoy the slow mo takedown cams as you explode fellow racers with missiles - perhaps from the comfort of an Ice Cream Van.

It’s up to you...

name: Crazy Bikers 3
description:
The craziest bike race around the world is back! Crazy Bikers 3, the best bicycle racing game ever is here!

Cool and crazy bicycles with turbo boost, extreme jumps and stunts, full rider and bike evolutions - all in Crazy Bikers 3!

name: Way of Tanks
description: Way of Tanks is the first and only tank race in the world. Speed up, overcome obstacles and traps as fast as you can! Destroy the enemies, use and upgrade your tank's super powers. Way of Tanks is the world of steel armor, clever maneuvers and adrenaline. Compete with your friends, drive your tank forward and become a true hero. Join the tanks army right now!

name: Just Turn Right
description:
Forget the brakes! You can do nothing but turn right!
Just drive a car from the point A to the point B! Sounds easy? What if you can do nothing but turn right?
Forget the brakes! Forget the seat belts! Get your finger ready and prepare yourself for really fast ride full of crashes, obstacles, explosions, driftings and jumps!

name: Crazy Road: Trouble Racer
description:
Compete your ranking in real time through out the world!
Your car is broken. It moves/turns toward right direction unless you control.
Don't forget to repair your mini car! Collect repair tools before your car burned out!
Experience the sudden acceleration. :)

name: Horror em Amityville
description: Horror em Amityville is a horror text adventure for the MSX.

name: Zone Family Fit
description: Manufactured by Subor; the software was likely developed by Waixing. It has a mat as controller.

name: Zone Fusion
description:
Zone Fusion - Vertically oriented, made by Jungletac. 30 games.
Games: Jewel Master, Ball Blaster, Imp and Cubes, Push the Box, Flame Beetles, Hard Win, Move Fun, Block Out, Bomb Hero, Mystic Totem, Little Plane, Fossick Underground, Mr. Onion, Beat the Bird, Block Flying, Mr. Ball, Puzzle Pop, Happy Farm, Morra, Find the Way, Climbing Challenge, Worm Catch, Ogriesh Flower, Winlinez, Ball Clash, Win or Lose, Pile the Box, Graden Weeder and Pool Quiz.

name: Zone 3D
description: Contains 20 3D anaglyph games and 80 2D games, credited to Jungletac.

name: Zone 100
description: Similar to the Zone 60 but with 40 more games.

name: Zone 60
description:
Games by Jungletac but looks identical to the "Smart Station" released in China by Subor. Some of its sports games are similar to those on the Sport Vii, but unlike that console it cannot sense direction or strength of motion. Another variant of this is the Wireless 60.
"Interactive" games (32-bit): Baseball, Basketball, Bowling, Dancing, Darts, Fishing, Golf, Pool, Tennis, Table Tennis.
"Arcade" games (16-bit): Auto Racing, Ball Battle, Big Burger, Brave Heart, Ball Blaster, Caddie, Coin Digger, Cooking Chaos, Crazy Coconuts, Deep Storm, Dragon, Egg Collector, Find The Way, Finger Dancing, Fire Fighter, Fruit Fall, Go Karts, Hay Bales, Hero Legend, Hot Drop, Ice Climber, Jewel Fever, Jewel Master 2, Lady Bugs, Lightning Plan, Magic Cubes, Match It Up, Mission, Motor Rally 2, Mr.Onion, Mystic Totem, Plumber Man, Pop Ball, Potion Commotion, Rapid Stream, Slot Machine, Sudoku, Speed Runner, Spiral Ball, Squirrel Bobble, Starry Night, Surf Adventure, Texas Hold'em, The Lost World, Tiger Rescue, Jet Skiing, Toy Kingdom, Treasure Hunt, Yummy.

name: Zone Mini
description:
A smaller console with only one controller, designed for portability. 35 games.
Games: Pro Tennis, Super Fighter, Golf Pro, Baseball, Basketball, Bowling, Swimming, Soccer Shooter, Fencing Champ, Badminton, Beach Volleyball, Dart's, Motercycle Ninja, Curling, Ping Pong Cup, Discus, High Jump, Hurdles, Javelin, Bee Eliminator, ArcherY, Racing Course, Racing, Pop Balloons, Snakes, Fire Fighter, Sudoko, Smart Porter, Chess, Catch 22, Simon, Cubes, Scuba Brick, Dance Master, The Mouse and the Cat.

name: Zone 40
description:
Zone 40 - Probably manufactured by Subor, most games copyrighted to Waixing.
Games: Golf, Bowling, Baseball, Tennis, Fishing, Competive Fencing, Ping Pong, Soccer, Swimming, Basketball, Darts, Discus, Javelin, High Jump, Long Jump, Triple Jump, 100 Meter, 110 Hurdles, Walking-Race, Sword Of Warriors, Chess Master, Motor Storm, The Mouse And The Cat, Undersea Adventure, Zuma, Highway Racing, Dancing Girls, Box World, Squares, Fire Man, Bomber-Man, Hitting Mice, Shooting Ballons, Snakes, Archery, Fish War, Sudoku, Tanks, Speed Racing and Bee Fighting.

name: Zone Interactive
description:
Claims to be 32-bit & 40 games on the packaging, actually has 41. Probably manufactured by Macro Winners but the software is Family Sports 41 in 1 by Senca, and the console seems to detect strength of motion (but not direction) unlike other Zones. Another variant of this system is called the InterAct from Intec.
Sports games: Tennis, Golf, Baseball, Table Tennis, Bowling, Darts, Basketball, Boxing.

name: Zone
description:
The first in the Zone line of consoles.

Includes seven games: TV Boxing, VR Tennis, Golf, Extreme Power Soccer, Bowling, Table Tennis, World Series Baseball. There is another version with Fishing instead of Baseball.

name: Wireless Air 60
description: The Wireless Air 60 is a console made by JungleTac, and is the successor to the Wireless 60. The console itself resembles Microsoft's Kinect device that comes with the Xbox 360 S consoles. Like the Kinect, the Wireless Air 60 uses your body instead of a physical controller to play games.

name: Sark Word Game
description:
Sark is unlike any word game you have played: a challenging addictive intergalactic brain battle you can play by yourself, with friends, and with players around the world!

25 letter cards are dealt one at a time from a 54-card deck. A player places each letter in their Sark Square (a 5x5 matrix) to form 3, 4, and 5-letter words across and down. Games last on average 5-10 minutes. A perfect score is 70 but there is no record of anyone scoring more than 60, and 50 is rare!

name: Frog!
description: Go and have a challenge!! Meet the Frog from the pond. He need to collect all those stars to turn himself into a prince.

name: Pudding Bubble
description: Pudding Bubble is bubble shoot game with cute pudding graphic.

name: George Pontos: The Stolen Lyre
description: In this action dangerous dungeons platformer game you are on a quest to find the lost instrument lyra. However, when George is on his way to find the instrument he is met by obstacles and bunch of crazy barbarians and other deadly dangers in this classic platform game. You don't always have to kill your enemies, you can also avoid them to save your dynamite and ammo. You have to be careful, you are in a world dangerous and spears are shot from some dungeons platforms.

name: Witch Market
description:
Beginning of a fairytale-like journey, Witch Market!
Run a witch’s vending machine on the fantastical Greed Island!

name: Legends of Bezogia
description: Dive into Legends of Bezogia, an MMORPG where you play as a Bezogi in a magical world, crafting weapons to defeat trolls, keyboard warriors, and the FUD King. Engage in quests, PVP, and PVE instances for endless fun, using memes and community tools for immersive gaming experience

name: Rhythm Rabbit
description: A fast-paced rhythm action game where you automatically move on the beat of the music, but the amount of steps changes on each move. React fast in order to progress or end up dying repeatedly.

name: Sanga
description: Seek the Sanga!

name: BlockPath
description: To solve the puzzle draw a path to fill out entire board. Don't be fooled by the simplicity, it's not as easy as it looks. Give it a try!

name: Tall Chess
description: Play with beautiful pieces and boards.

name: Ins and Outs
description: Play hundreds of free puzzles in casual play mode and get promoted through the ranks. Or race against the clock in competitive play mode to solve as many puzzles as you can in one minute, and dare your friends to beat your score while you compete for a spot on the global leaderboards. Solve puzzles without lifting your finger and with as few lines as possible for extra points and stars!

name: Astro Rush
description:
Race through space and dodge the obstacles at breakneck speed.
Take control of two meteorites in this fast-paced high score game while you rush through a trippy galaxy. Rotate the meteorites through the obstacles. If you fail once, you will have one meteorite left and switch from rotating to dodging controls. You can play in normal mode or in three different wireframe modes.

name: Animal Hot Springs
description:
"Animal Hot Springs" is an idle 'casual' management game.
Run your hot springs successfully to make it the most popular place ever.
You can earn acorns from animals visited.
Buy various bath items and upgrade the facilities with your acorns.

name: Soccer Heroes RPG
description:
Welcome to the best RPG fantasy soccer cards game! Become one of the greatest football heroes playing with your dreamteam over the world! Play as a soccer captain and manage your players to win every match! Soccer Heroes is the best fantasy soccer game ever!
Pass, dribble, shoot and goal! Experience real soccer as you create your own football dreamteam signing new players as a captain. Choose your soccer cards, level up and evolve your soccer heroes and score amazing goals in this manga soccer game!
Download Soccer Heroes, the ultimate football manager, and start scoring goals and managing your dreamteam to victory!

name: Pro Skiing
description: Your lifelong dream is to become an Olympic skier. Now the time has come to see whether you can make it happen. Put on your old skis and navigate through a number of deadly obstacle courses on your way to glory or remain forever forgotten in this cruel reality that we call life.

name: Infinite Slice
description: Addictive & minimalist game for all ages.

name: Bubble Bubbling
description: Match at least Four bubbles in one line to get scores.

name: Louie Lucha
description: Body-slams and elbow-drops with a side of guacamole! Battle bizarre opponents using simple one-tap controls as you play energizing mariachi melodies to fuel Louie's rage. The addicting, fast paced gameplay is wrapped in vibrant hand-crafted visuals full of personality. Two different game modes give you multiple ways to progress!

name: Beautiful Indie Worlds Bundle
description: Two beautiful indie stories in one bundle!

name: HarleQuest!
description: 3D roguelike dungeon crawler currently in development for the Sega Dreamcast and PC.

name: Quiz Quest
description:
Quiztal Games introduces Quiz Quest: a mind-stretching, collaborative quizcapade!

Team up with friends and family, using your smartphones as your controllers, and put your heads together as you journey to achieve the rank of Master Quizards.

The fallen knight Sir Answerlot needs you to take up his failed quest to rid the kingdom of its most hated tormentor: the evil dragon Spontanius the Combustor. You will need to keep your wits about you as you encounter many allies and enemies, make many crucial decisions and answer many, many quiz questions along the way.

name: Bloons But You're the Bloon
description: Bloons is a popular online game where players use a monkey character to pop balloons bloons using various weapons and tools. In this version of the game, "Bloons but you're the bloon," the player takes on the role of a bloon and must evade being popped by the monkey characters. As the bloon, the player will navigate through different levels, each with their unique challenges and obstacles. The player must avoid the monkey's attacks, such as darts, bombs, and boomerangs, and find ways to get past the monkey's defenses. To do this, the bloon has a range of abilities and upgrades that can be earned throughout the game. The player can customize their bloon by choosing different types of bloons, each with unique abilities and weaknesses. As the player progresses through the game, the monkey characters become more challenging, and the levels become more difficult. The ultimate goal of the game is to make it through all the levels without getting popped by the monkeys.

name: Ochakai he no Shoutaijou
description: An indie otome game about a tea party

name: Cheri La Bete
description:
The shut-in princess' first mission is making a pact with a dragon!
She departs, along with her trusty knight, but...

name: Knights of Valour Plus
description: Sin descripción

name: Space Lines
description: Sin descripción

name: Double Smash Ninja
description: Double Smash Ninja is a challenging endless runner.

name: Jelly Lab Reloaded
description:
From the makers of Darklings, here comes the wiggly jiggly experience, Jelly Lab!
Lab Experiment goes wrong and you have to smack all jellies before it all collapses!
Prepare your fingers to ultimate showdown!

name: Fatum Betula + Knights & Guns
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Vadimka X2
description: Super Vadimka X2 - is a free video game made by two developers VadimBallzGame and HyperTheLoopa420 for Windows. The game was released on April 9, 2023, and in North America in 2023. This is a direct sequel to Super Vadimka X, released in the same year. The action of Super Vadimka X2 takes place in the near future, a new opponent named Chris Chan wants to take over the world and kill the main character Super Vadimka X will the hero be able to survive a second time.

name: Meta Nemesis
description: Meta Nemesis is a competitive fantasy tactical shooter with blockchain technology, making it a unique first-person shooter. Customize your core set of abilities to play exactly how you want to, as you battle fierce enemies and other players in exciting 5v5 matches. Immerse yourse

name: Shattered
description: A shattering revival of '90s fighting games set in a sci-fi/fantasy world inspired by European comics.

name: Final Frontier
description: In a ruthless post-apocalyptic world, every day counts. Choose carefully where to hide to avoid the dangers of the hostile environment and deadly enemies. Overcome every challenge to survive one more day. Are you ready to take on the challenge and stay alive?

name: Indie Game Farmer
description: A game about the downsized game industry practitioners, return to the hometown farm and realize the indie game dream.

name: Oceanfall
description: Oceanfall is an atmospheric 3D adventure that takes place on a distant planet that has collapsed due to oceanic flooding. Take control of WR-7, a young girl that is tasked with descending the watery depths, while uncovering the dark mysteries that exist both above and below the ocean surface.

name: Cube Heroes
description: A Magic Cube Roguelike: shuffle to match monsters and abilities, traverse a randomly generated path and fight powerful enemies. Choose the right path to victory. Collect rare items to acquire powerful synergies. Can you survive this dangerous journey?

name: Shardpunk: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Emergency Parking Only
description: A physics-based parking pileup for up to four players. Smash other players' cars out of the way while placing your own cars perfectly - all without any brakes. A delightfully silly party game that'll have you rolling!

name: Rhythm Lust Girl
description: Rhythm Lust Girl is a casual puzzle game. There are 12 beautiful girls with different characteristics in the game. Enjoy the time of jigsaw puzzle with them.

name: Bullet Brawl
description: Endless action!

name: Sukebe Fantasy
description: Break all the blocks and collect the images.

name: Fragments of the Afterlife
description: As a horror-based RPG, Fragments utilizes a dynamic camera system as well as breathtaking stylized graphics to enhance the fast-paced combat to the in-depth lore. Traverse four unique domains defeating the lost to grow stronger, learn skills and save the afterlife.

name: Soliloquy
description: In a vast desert, a lost young man's voice interrupts its silence. While he tries to survive, reality and fiction blur, questioning the perception of existence, freedom and control.

name: Momo no Hana ha Senketsu ni Somaru
description: A Japanese visual novel about the adventures of Onmyoji girls.

name: Factoryopolis
description: Build and run a car factory to design, produce and sell high-quality cars, while expanding your business. Manage resources, research new technologies, and meet market demand. As the factory grows, you can hire more employees and unlock new features.

name: Cactus Venture
description: A platformer about the adventure of a cactus: where it goes and where it ends remains to be seen. You have to play as a cute cactus on a classic platform game. An adventure and arcade game. Also in the game are saws, thorns, doors, and elevators.

name: Death Raid
description: "Death Raid" is a primal action-packed hack-and-slash game, where you'll face a powerful zombie horde. Enjoy pure gameplay with no complex equipment systems, allowing you to focus on gameplay and feel. Only the bravest can survive this dangerous and challenging world. Are you ready?

name: Doggo Garden Defense
description: Critters are on their way to eat your carrots! Recruit fearsome Doggos to shoo them away in this casual yet strategic Tower Defense game. Defend your garden across a variety of different levels, each with four difficulty modes. Can you save your crops, or will the Critters win?

name: Fallen
description: Be the light that shines on the world by climbing to the top. The way up is never easy. Can you avoid all obstacles and climb to the top?

name: Desolation
description: Desolation will bring a complete Looter-Shooter experience to Mobile Devices with fresh controls, a focus on teamplay and a lot of build customization with near endless potential for maximizing your efficiency.

name: Socket Fighters
description: Domestic appliances battle it out in this 2D fighting game. Fight in familiar household settings using everyday items as weapons. Enjoy unique character animations and special attacks for an action-packed experience!

name: Aurendor
description: Aurendor is an open world survival game. Players must gather resources, cook their meals and fight dangerous creatures to survive and build a home for themselves. Aurendor also offers a multiplayer game option. Players can play together by cooperating with or battling other survivors.

name: Ninja Party
description: Ninja Party is a 2-4 player local multiplayer game! Play as one of four ninjas in disguise, and blend in with the townfolk. Identify your friends and take them out or enlist the help of an aggressive yet adorable dog to do the dirty work for you.

name: Jane’s Hotel: New story - Collector’s Edition
description: The long-awaited reboot of Jane’s Hotel is here. Jane is ready to start new hotels. Start with a small hotel and go further. Three fully upgradable hotels are awaiting.

name: Speed Golf Royale
description: A golf game where speed matters!

name: Hentai Ami
description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

name: Second Dreamer
description: Rent games, pick out a movie for movie night, buy fireworks, explore the town and neighborhood, the world is yours but this particular night holds many secrets.

name: Dominus Solaris
description: In the year 2073, the Skolovan Empire attacked and subdued planet Earth. The rebels gathered technology from whatever they could to build a prototype ship, the Dominus Solaris. Now it's up to you, the ship's sole pilot, to fight and liberate the Earth from the usurpers.

name: Industrix
description: Step into the world of industrial production and become a master in factory-building! Create efficient production lines and manage your resources. As you progress through the game, you'll need to complete challenges for a certain company in order to rank up and unlock new technologies!

name: Battery Samurai
description: Get batteries to get stronger! Enjoy your adventure now! Recover lost parts and get various skills.

name: Bendo
description: Bendo is an action/third person shooter game that takes place in France, and that offers you a full open map to explore, gangsters to fight, drug lords to beat, and much more.

name: Planetary Factory
description: Grow your planetary empire from a small base to a massive production powerhouse in Planetary Factory. Balance inputs and outputs to maximize profits and minimize waste, research advanced technologies, and build a formidable military to conquer hostile planets.

name: Space Captain McCallery Episode 4: The Turquoise Temple
description: Space Pirate Captain McCallery travels to a mysterious planet of Turquoise to uncover the secrets of the Turquoise Temple

name: Conflux
description: Immerse yourself in a unique fantasy world as you explore and interact with a wide variety of colourful characters. Engage in strategic turn-based battles alongside your trusted allies. Uncover the story as it unfurls across the diverse realms of this spellbinding role-playing game.

name: Conundrum Catacombs
description: "Light up your path to victory in this thrilling 2D top-down puzzle game. With only a torch to guide you, navigate through challenging levels and solve mind-bending puzzles. Will you keep your flame burning or succumb to the darkness?"

name: Seaport Tycoon
description: Sin descripción

name: Archesis
description: Save the kingdom of Archesis in this unique 2D metroidvania game where you can freeze time! Traverse a vast kingdom packed with exciting encounters, unlock new abilities, and overcome its various obstacles! Skillfully harness the power of time, as time only moves when you move.

name: Bird's Eye Odyssey
description: Take to the skies and explore a lush world in Bird's Eye Odyssey, a captivating 3D adventure game. Play as a bird protagonist on a quest to uncover the truth about his banishment, and complete tasks like collecting rings, driving a tank, and discovering hidden objects.

name: Steel Rampart
description: Steel Rampart (Steel Rampart) is a 2D game in which players need to control machine guns to defend themselves against incoming enemies, including planes and tanks.

name: Resourcer
description: Dig deep into diverse biomes, uncover ancient treasures and mine various resources. Craft new tools and build various production structures. Improve your character’s skills and unlock new features as you progress through the game. Manage the resources and create an efficient production chain.

name: Riddle of the Jelly
description: The adventure… the glory… the mystery… Can you solve the Riddle of the Jelly?

name: Outway
description: Outway is a 3d platform collectathon, metroidvania. Staring a spherical robot that looks like a football, you roll, monkey ball style, utilizing your bodies physics to get to new areas and explore a mysterious future world populated by machines.

name: Dungeon of Argion
description: Fight the underground creatures of Argion to free the land from a curse. You have to fight your way through several dungeons full of dangerous creatures and bosses. Try to utilise, level up and combine many different weapons and passive items to stand a chance of defeating them all.

name: Axolotl Kingdom
description: Axolotl Kingdom is a charming hand drawn pet simulator, where you can adopt your own Axolotl. You can customise your Axolotl with 40 unique accessories, with options for all styles! Our Kingdom is brimming with life, with locations such as the Cafe and Arcade. There’s so much to explore and enjoy!

name: Neon Magic: Witch Shop
description: Become the owner of a store selling all sorts of magical knick-knacks and earn money by selling potions, staffs, magical weapons, and other junk. Improve your shop-tower and hire assistants.

name: Omnipresence
description: Play as a Computer Virus that can take control of any robot, your mission is to destroy them all!

name: Cyber Tamer
description: Evolve your mech-enabled Cybermon, investigate the mystery behind your family's death, and craft the strategy of time to become the world's best Cybermon trainer!

name: Slingshot Trip
description: In Slingshot Trip, you must use different types of ammunition to survive successive waves of enemies for as long as possible. Avoid attacks, use traps and shields, plan your attacks, and achieve better results to beat other players' records and become the champion of the game!

name: NTRstory
description: NTRStory is a casual simulation game where you, the player will plan your step to lead Wifuko to the journey of lust and happiness. Choose your path of either Netorare, Netori, or Netorase, this is your story...

name: Digits
description: A daily numbers puzzle from The New York Times.

name: Escalar
description: Escalar is an adventure precision platformer, with collectathon and puzzle elements. Climb a mysterious tower to reach the rumoured treasures that lie within!

name: Warbits+
description: Warbits+ is a charming turn-based strategy game where victory is achieved through tactics and determination. Compete with your friends locally and online, hone your skills with single-player missions, or battle for glory against other commanders on the community hub.

name: ExTime: Primal Menace
description: ExTime: Primal Menace is an action-adventure horror game inspired by iconic franchises such as Dino Crisis and Resident Evil. Travel to the archipelago in the Bermuda Triangle and find out what brought the monsters of the Cretaceous period back to our world.

name: Marsel: The Alien Clown
description: Explore the magical world of Circus with Marsel in this wonderful 2D platform game inspired by classic platformer games of the 90's. When Marsel's spaceship crashes on Earth, he discovers that the parts needed for repairs can only be found on Circuses of yesterday, today, and tomorrow!

name: Pirate Plight
description: It's pirates against British sailors (or each other) in this real-time strategy city-building game. Gather resources, build cities, drink rum, fight enemies, explore the sea, and discover new islands.

name: Mystillion
description: Once. A certain village was destroyed by the hands of the devil. "Red Village Tragedy - " The only girl who survived the incident called that - Isla. Even though she was tormented by the memories of her past, she lived each day to the fullest.

name: A.S.S.: Awesome Street Skaters
description: Awesome Street Skaters is a gritty skateboarding action-management game. Grab your skateboard and challenge your neighborhood skaters. Travel the world and compete against the best. Prove yourself and rise up to the World Championship.

name: Outlaw Kingdom
description: A Strategy, Auto Battle, Roguelite Game. Take control of your outlaws, rob, steal and fight your way to riches. Build up your camp and recruit more outlaws so you can take over the Kingdom.

name: Die Rave
description: Rave is a grim dark fantasy puzzle game where you play as a lost soul trying to find salvation from eternal suffering in the endless corridors of hell. You'll need to solve challenging puzzles and fight off enemies to progress through the game's immersive storyline.

name: Ocean Cat
description: Ocean Cat is a very fun fishing game. The main character of the game is a cute little cat wearing a diving suit,

name: Core Lords
description: A lone quarry worker has life and the elements come crashing down... Go on an adventure in a strange world wielding powerful geomancer-like abilities against the environment, solving puzzles and fighting odd creatures in turn-based battles in CORE LORDS.

name: Gain Foxes
description: This game is a business simulation where you aim to achieve a target amount of money along with the merchant Finne. The business strategies are deployed by each player by combining five choices.

name: My Best Friend Kouta
description: In this slice of life game focused heavily on Netorare, Eisen introduces Evie, his delicate and gentle girlfriend, to his perverted best friend Kouta. As Kouta slowly burns Evie's mind, you in the role of Eisen can explore the city and uncover what's happening.

name: V.O.I.D.: Vexation of Infinite Dungeons
description: Unleash your medieval might in our co-op dungeon crawler! Pick from 5 classes, confront dark fantasy monsters, loot, and watch out for backstabbing allies. Procedurally generated worlds - every playthrough is unique. Conquer the dungeon and win!

name: Doki Simp Club
description: After simping too hard for streaming waifus, Ren uncovers a corrupt billionaire's plan to weaken men and take down society. Adventure alongside a secret task force while you simp for anime girls (without your actual money) to save the world.

name: Grade Sword
description: Grade Sword is a turn-based strategy rogue like game in which a soldier with a changing weapon takes the king to the castle by removing obstacles. Get the possibility of new weapons with mini-games, events, and money, and beat the probability to safely take the king to the castle.

name: Edentopia
description: Explore a magical open world in our adventure crafting game. Craft spells, collect rare items, and fight bosses to expand your base. With endless customization and exploration, every playthrough is unique. Embrace the power of magic and survive in this treacherous world.

name: Mechanical Gods
description: Mechanical Gods is a 3D Arena Fighting game. Choose your favourite fighter and test your skills against powerful AIs and players alike, hitting, slashing, dashing and kicking your way through every arena. Each fight you survive gets you closer to unveil the secrets of the Mechanical Gods.

name: Find the Way Out Samurai!
description: Find the Way Out Samurai! is an indie-action game where you play as a skilled samurai who has been tasked with taking down the big boss who is causing chaos and destruction throughout the land.

name: Assault Sector
description: Welcome to a brutal and unforgiving PvP Arena Shooter. With a unique pulse wallhack ability, camping is impossible. Pure adrenaline, all the time. A throwback to a "golden-era" of classic FPS Games. Do you have what it takes? Let's see. Jump in.

name: Graveyard Sprint
description: Graveyard Sprint is a 3D parkour game that combines gothic style with exciting gameplay

name: StarGazers
description: A shape-shifting, interactive nature experience. Transform into animals and explore the world around you.

name: Quecksilber
description: A fast-paced futuristic sports game, with accurate ball physics, retro and fun gameplay, heavily inspired by classics like Kick Off, NHL and Speedball.

name: Zero Lilium Bloom
description: Explore cycles of growth and transformation in a vibrant world full of life and surprises. With relaxing cultivation simulation, action-packed exploration, stunning graphics, immersive sound, and intuitive gameplay.

name: Fujiwara Phoenix
description: In this metroidvania Touhou fan game, burn a path through Gensokyo as Fujiwara no Mokou with a powerful array of unlockable abilities, but exercise caution as they will burn you right back. Merciless aggression is the key; with defeating enemies as the only way to restore precious hp.

name: Outside the Blocks
description: Unleash your creativity and design your own diorama in Outside the Blocks ‒ a full-featured model builder. Shape the terrain, assemble modular houses, add decorations and put your creation on display!

name: Lasting Moonlight
description: Lasting moonlight is a walking simulator focused on story and unique minigames. As the narrator is faced with the consequences of his own actions, he reaces out to you, the player, to help him repair what is left. Learn the truth while exploring beautifull locations and game mechanics.

name: AI Unbound
description: AI Unbound is a captivating, atmospheric puzzle-adventure game where you dive into a unique experience crafted by an AI, complete engaging puzzles, and unveil the story behind your enigmatic journey in this thought-provoking world. Note: this description was written by an AI.

name: The Final Exhibition
description: Explore an ever-changing maze as you hunt for photos of important objects and avoid whatever could be stalking you throughout the halls.

name: Hong Kong Obscure
description: Experience the trippy and mysterious world of "Hong Kong Obscure". Armed with a magic flashlight, frisbee, and projectile gun, uncover hidden secrets and hunt down invisible spies in the gritty slums of Hong Kong.

name: Timberquest
description: Embark on an adventure in our RPG game! Explore a new, wild continent and fight to survive against environmental factors and monsters. With a heavy focus on cooperative play. Customize your character's stat-driven abilities to suit your preferred playstyle.

name: Panic
description: Panic is a single-player, horror game that puts you in the shoes of David, a young man who struggles with mental disorders. As you join him on his journey you will discover an immersive narrative experience that will stay with you long after you finish your journey.

name: Tycoon Legends
description: Will you rise to the top and become a Tycoon Legend?

name: Strato Supremacy
description: Strato Supremacy is a flight combat simulation game where players defeat enemies and destroy cities with different planes and weapons while navigating through randomly generated terrains.

name: Secret Blade
description: Take command of the mystical forge of Hephaestus and craft the most legendary weapons in the war against evil. Travel the world facing challenges in singleplayer or co-op. Combine materials and master crafting steps while protecting your forge from enemies and fighting against time!

name: Counterclocking
description: A Bayo-May-Cry inspired action game based in a cyberpunk world. Cutting through your way between cyborgs, mutants, and robots while listening to the great soundtracks!

name: Yet Another Hentai Puzzle: PTSD
description: Discover the best Hentai Puzzle Visual Novel on Steam! Enjoy stunning art, beautiful ladies, soothing music, and an intriguing story - all to make your evening delightful!

name: Zombi Rockstar
description: Zombi Rockstar is a platform game with zombies and rock and roll in which you will travel the city escaping from the holocaust zombie canival.

name: Disease Z
description: On January 14, 2024, what we thought was the common flu turned into something terrible. It's been 6 years since then. You are the last survivor of Z City. Create, Build, Hunt and try to survive in a post-apocalyptic environment.

name: Sciware Defense
description: A 3D FPS/TPS Tower Defence game in a sci-fi world, defend your base from corrupted robots and unlock better turrets

name: Betroyal
description: Betroyal is a fast-paced roguelite turn-based tactical game, in which you play as a king dethroned by his own daughter. Gather an army from scratch, hire different mercenaries with exclusive skills, and level up your commander unlocking new destructive powers to get your throne back!

name: Brewess
description: Brewess is a narrative adventure game about crafting ales and building friendships in Early Modern East Anglia. The region is plagued with power struggles that you must navigate as a brewer, using your dry wit and natural charm to keep your business open and your purses full.

name: Captain Moviestar 3D
description: An FPS starring your favorite platformer character Captain Moviestar… now in full three-dimensions. Early 90’s 2.5D-raycaster-style shooter for the proto-boomer set.

name: Backrooms Project: The Lost File
description: Backrooms Project: The Lost File - it's a horror exploration game, with many puzzles

name: Candy Lattice
description: Candy Lattice is a fun and addictive puzzle game that challenges your ability to strategize and think on your feet.

name: Kook
description: In this fast-paced, retro FPS game with a Quake-like feel, players will battle Lovecraftian monsters in a Victorian-era steampunk world using crazy weapons and navigating mind-bending gravity.

name: Erenshor
description: Erenshor is a single player nod to the MMORPGs of the past. Created specifically for the nostalgic gamer who no longer wants to commit to online or scheduled play times, it offers unrestricted exploration, strategic battles, and countless weapons, armors, and spells to discover.

name: Breach in Space
description: Breach in Space is a 2D shooting game with challenging combat and platforming. Find a way back to home galaxy through 4 different planets.

name: Underboard
description: A roguelike autobattler about people appearing in a dangerous place. Build a team of characters, equip them with items and aid them with spells to battle against monsters and meet their fate in the Underboard.

name: Nightshaders
description: In this thrilling co-op twin-stick shooter, play as a group of brave kids who must fight against hordes of creepy monsters. Collect and upgrade an arsenal of unique homemade weapons and abilities to battle through exciting environments and defeat powerful bosses.

name: Haunted Heye Apartment
description: Strange things frequently happen in the apartment, such as the black shadow by the bed, the face behind the curtains, and the eccentric neighbor... This old apartment seems to be hiding some unknown secrets... Will you walk ignorantly into death or discover the truth and escape to safety?

name: Anseion
description: Get ready for a journey to the world of Anseion, an immersive 2D MMORPG. Choose your fraction: good or evil. Fight against players and monsters, explore the fascinating world, collect items and create your own. Make a unique character. Participate in events and fraction battles, increase your rank.

name: Kaiten Sushi VR
description: Kaiten Sushi VR is a game that you can experience basic operations of a conveyor belt sushi restaurant.

name: Santas Basement
description: Join forces with friends to defeat an evil witch and save Christmas in the cooperative game Santa's Basement.

name: Fruit Jammin'
description: Fruit Jammin’ is a narrative driven puzzle-platformer where you take on the role of Fig, a 16-year-old musician bat. Use your unique abilities to convert nearly every sound in the game into light, solve puzzles by doing so, reconnect with your friends, and save the annual fall festival.

name: Pirate Island
description: In Pirate Island, you play as the legendary pirate captain Blackbeard, who has returned from the dead to reclaim your lost island. The game is a top-down, Soulslike-style action-RPG, where you must navigate dangerous environments, defeat challenging enemies, and upgrade your character to progress.

name: Mini Golf Worlds
description: Play mini golf across dozens of amazing 3D worlds packed full of physics puzzles and mini putt magic. Take your chance on the high seas, adventure into tombs of lost civilizations, trek across vast deserts or simply keep it real with amazing and fun classic mini golf levels.

name: Teeny Dungeon
description: Traverse a teeny, yet infinite dungeon! Fight goblins and grab gold in the smallest rogue-like to ever exist!

name: Hellcrossing
description: This is you. Imagine that you have not been the best person in the real world and that when you die, do not go to heaven, you're going to hell. But you still have one last chance, you have the option of escape. You must run, jump, dodge and give the best you have to cross the boiler souls.

name: Cracks Where the Light Gets In
description: A story-driven observational puzzler that requires logical deductions from limited perspectives. Peer through tiny gaps to glean clues about a family living in a one-room shack above an alpine valley. Can you piece together what led them there and shine a little hope on their fractured lives?

name: Coral Caper
description: Welcome to Coral Caper, the thrilling shark-scrolling running game! In this game

name: Bullet Heck
description: Deck your friends and opponents in this competitive card based bullet hell amalgamation!

name: Broken Soul
description: Broken soul is a personal hell of a lost person, which makes Alex meet his own demons. Should he lose to his fears or he must struggle and fight off the things his own mind hides?

name: Borderline Homicide
description: This is a mysterious homicide that occurred in the forest of the border area. A forest ranger died under mysterious circumstances during patrol, without obvious external injuries but with suspected trap marks. As the player, you have to uncover the truth behind the murder.

name: Amazon Quest
description: Amazon Quest is an educational game that allows the player to control a brave explorer. The goal is to map all the Amazon region, its villages, tribes, plants and animals by playing match 3 levels.

name: BeDo
description: Traverse galactic phases and find the Dough scattered throughout space in an addictive adventure of precision and relaxing floating

name: Turn on the lights! Brain Game
description: Enjoy this new and exciting puzzle game!

name: Mabus 3000
description: Mabus 3000 is an arcade shooter game where you control a single player in battle with increasingly more difficult enemies and levels in the spirit of Space Invaders and Galaga.

name: Lost In The Murk
description: Lost in the Murk is an atmospheric psychological horror experience, exploring the human condition through deep narrative. Explore a top-down environment of pitch darkness, gather materials from a broken world, and craft items to help your journey into the Murk.

name: The Kingpin
description: Kingpin is a popular, tactical board game, today available also for iOS users. It takes place in a dark city. The players are involved in the fight between four crime groups: the Russian Mob, the Italian Mafia, the Colombian Cartel and the Yakuza. Shootings, murders and robberies happen very often. The city can be ruled only by one group. Users have to choose their mafia and do their best to support it. In each group there are various characters with different skills which are useful during direct confrontation with the enemy. The player's task is to defeat the opponent mafia and take control of the city. Nice graphics, based on the aesthetic of a comic strip make the game even more interesting. There are three different tactics which can lead you to success, but there is only one Kingpin!

name: Endless Anime Golf
description: Are you an anime lover with a passion for golf? This exciting game combines the best of both worlds, with stunning anime visuals and challenging golf gameplay. Best of all, Endless Anime Golf features procedural generation, which means every round is unique and unpredictable.

name: Finland Corruption Simulator
description: experience boring life in simulator game and this will just is it finland corruption simulator and then you can just play it nothing intresting so do what ever you want in game what you will can so basically nothing

name: Float
description: Control a bear cub, collect food, plant fruit trees, build rooms, grab food from enemies, and fight.

name: Green Squares
description: Pure Simple Physics Fun. Green Squares is A physics based time trial, where there are green squares, that need to be not green!

name: Super Zeek
description: Just touch and lead Zeek to get mushroom, and avoid bad pink flower!

name: Paradise Sex
description: Paradise Sex - is the simplest 2D puzzle that you will remember with its hot images.

name: Dr. Maria
description:
Dr. Mary is a classic minigame, in which you are playing as a doctor to kill the bacteria with different capsules.
